dct_title_s: Map of the Lydenburg gold fields, S.A. Republic (Transvaal)
dct_description_sm: Map of the Lydenburg gold fields area showing gold diggings, surveyed lines including those in dispute, approximate lines, the Portuguese line, the Swaziland line, main and other roads, kraals and farms boundaries and farm numbers.
Bar scale on map given in "English Miles."

Inset: Index to farm numbers, farm names, names of owners and the areas in English acres (with remarks). The index includes a certification that the details were certified as checked and found correct by Jacobus Johannes Meintjes, Registrar of Deeds for the South African Republic, Registry Office, Pretoria, August 4th, 1883.
"Entered at Stationer's Hall & copyright registered in the Cape Colony."
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
